content: That's great! I think I'll try the Mint Lemonade and the Basil Limeade. I have a lot of mint and basil in my garden right now, so it'll be perfect. I just harvested a big batch of fresh basil and made pesto for the first time today, and I'm excited to use it in my cooking and drinks. Do you have any tips on how to store the fresh herbs to keep them fresh for a longer period?
